title: Exam: Contactless Payments & Wearable Tech Security

questions.question: What does 'NFC' stand for in the context of mobile payments?
options: National Finance Corporation
Near Field Communication
Network Frequency Control
New Financial Contact
questions.explanation: NFC (Near Field Communication) es la tecnología inalámbrica de corto alcance para realizar pagos sin contacto.

questions.question: Which sentence correctly uses 'must' to express a security obligation?
options: You must to lock your phone.
You must locking your phone.
You must lock your phone.
You musts lock your phone.
questions.explanation: Después del verbo modal 'must', el verbo principal siempre va en infinitivo sin 'to'.

questions.question: What is 'Tokenization' in digital payments?
options: Exchanging physical coins for digital ones
Replacing sensitive card data with a unique identifier or 'token'
A type of physical bank vault used for gold
A method of printing plastic credit cards
questions.explanation: La tokenización protege los datos reales de la tarjeta reemplazándolos con un código único durante la transacción.

questions.question: Choose the correct way to express a prohibition in English:
options: You mustn't share your digital wallet passcode.
You mustn't to share your digital wallet passcode.
You must not sharing your digital wallet passcode.
You don't must share your digital wallet passcode.
questions.explanation: 'Mustn't' (must not) se utiliza para prohibiciones, seguido del verbo en su forma base.

questions.question: What is the primary function of a 'Digital Wallet'?
options: To charge the phone's battery via solar energy
To store payment information securely on a mobile device
To provide physical cash from the phone screen
To track the physical location of a leather wallet
questions.explanation: Una billetera digital (como Apple Pay o Google Pay) almacena virtualmente tus tarjetas de pago.

questions.question: If you see a suspicious device attached to a reader, you ______ use it.
options: must
can
mustn't
could
questions.explanation: Es una prohibición de seguridad: no debes (mustn't) usar terminales que parezcan manipulados.

questions.question: Which of these is an example of 'Biometric Authentication'?
options: Signing a paper receipt with a pen
Using a fingerprint or face scan to unlock a payment
Showing a physical ID card to a cashier
Typing a 4-digit PIN on a keypad
questions.explanation: La biometría utiliza rasgos físicos únicos (huella, rostro) para verificar la identidad.

questions.question: Which device is considered 'Wearable Tech'?
options: A laptop computer
A smartwatch with NFC capabilities
A traditional desktop monitor
A standard office telephone
questions.explanation: La tecnología vestible (wearable) incluye dispositivos que se llevan puestos, como relojes inteligentes o anillos.

questions.question: What is 'Skimming'?
options: Reading a book very quickly to find keywords
Illegally capturing data from a card's magnetic stripe
Transferring money between two digital wallets
Updating the operating system of a smartphone
questions.explanation: El skimming es el robo de información de tarjetas mediante dispositivos fraudulentos en lectores físicos.

questions.question: Complete the security rule: 'You ______ report a stolen smartwatch immediately.'
options: mustn't
must
can't
won't
questions.explanation: Se usa 'must' para expresar una obligación o regla crítica de seguridad.

questions.question: What does the term 'Tap to Pay' mean?
options: Paying for water from a public tap
Using contactless technology by touching a device to a terminal
Clicking repeatedly on a website button
Typing a password very fast on a phone
questions.explanation: 'Tap to Pay' es el acto de pagar acercando o tocando el lector con un dispositivo NFC.

questions.question: What is the main benefit of 'Data Encryption'?
options: It makes the app icons look bigger
It converts data into an unreadable code to prevent hacking
It makes the phone internet connection faster
It allows users to use the app without a battery
questions.explanation: El cifrado (encryption) protege la información sensible convirtiéndola en código secreto.

questions.question: Which sentence follows correct English grammar for prohibition?
options: We mustn't writing our PIN on a piece of paper.
We mustn't write our PIN on a piece of paper.
We mustn't to write our PIN on a piece of paper.
We not must write our PIN on a piece of paper.
questions.explanation: La estructura correcta es: Sujeto + mustn't + verbo base.

questions.question: Why is 'Remote Wipe' a useful security feature?
options: To clean the dust off the phone screen
To delete all data from a lost device from a distance
To increase the storage capacity of the device
To change the wallpaper of the phone
questions.explanation: El borrado remoto (remote wipe) permite eliminar tus datos bancarios si pierdes el dispositivo.

questions.question: When do we use the modal verb 'Must'?
options: For things that are optional or fun
For strong obligations, rules, or necessities
For things that happened in the past
Only when asking for permission
questions.explanation: 'Must' se utiliza para expresar obligaciones fuertes, leyes o necesidades imperativas.

questions.question: Before using a public payment reader, what should you do?
options: Restart your smartwatch
Check for any signs of tampering or suspicious parts
Ask the cashier for their personal phone number
Disable the internet on your phone
questions.explanation: Es fundamental inspeccionar el terminal para evitar ser víctima de skimming.

questions.question: A 'Payment Ring' is an example of:
options: Traditional physical currency
Contactless wearable technology
A desktop-only banking tool
A type of bank insurance
questions.explanation: Un anillo de pago es un dispositivo 'wearable' que permite pagar mediante NFC.

questions.question: Correct the grammar error: 'You mustn't sharing your security codes.'
options: You mustn't share your security codes.
You must share your security codes.
You mustn't to share your security codes.
You don't must share your security codes.
questions.explanation: Se debe usar el infinitivo sin 'to' (share) después de 'mustn't'.

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'Magnetic Stripe' on old cards?
options: To help the card slide better into the wallet
To store account data that can be read by swiping
To decorate the back of the card
To measure the length of the card
questions.explanation: La banda magnética es la tecnología antigua que almacena datos de la cuenta.

questions.question: If your device is lost, you ______ deactivate your virtual cards via the bank app.
options: mustn't
must
won't
couldn't
questions.explanation: Es obligatorio (must) desactivar las tarjetas para prevenir fraudes tras una pérdida.
